name: cte-commander
description: Client(Commander) Application for Capture the Ether(https://capturetheether.com/).
author: Yuta Tsurusaki <biz@yuta-tsurusaki.com> (https://github.com/yuta-tsurusaki)

scripts.start: docker-compose run -u root cte-commander yarn ts-node
scripts.hardhat: docker-compose run -u root cte-commander npx hardhat run
